1.1.1.1.hardeningScript:
#!/bin/sh
# Disables the 'cramfs' kernel module.

# Blacklist the module to prevent loading
(echo "install cramfs /bin/false" >> /etc/modprobe.d/cramfs.conf)
(echo "blacklist cramfs" >> /etc/modprobe.d/cramfs.conf)

# Unload the module if it is currently loaded
rmmod cramfs
1.1.1.1.auditScript:
#!/bin/sh
# Checks if 'cramfs' is disabled.

lsmod | grep "cramfs" || echo "Module not loaded"
! grep -P -- '^(install|blacklist)\s+cramfs\b' /etc/modprobe.d/* && echo "Module not configured to be disabled"
1.1.1.1.revertHardeningScript:
#!/bin/sh
# Enables the 'cramfs' kernel module.

rm -f /etc/modprobe.d/cramfs.conf
modprobe cramfs
